pages.text: $(li)The Nether Bricks can be used to craft Nether Brick Fences, Nether Brick Fence Gates, Nether Bricks, Red Nether Bricks, Blue Nether Bricks and a Blood Sprayer.$(br)$(li)You can throw them to your enemies right clicking while you have a Nether Brick on your hand.

$(li)They will inflict half of heart of damage and will push your enemies away too.$(br)$(li)You can obtain Bricks smelting Clay in a Furnace, Baking or Kiln.$(br)$(li)Their throw range is the lowest compared to the Brick and Mud Brick.
